meta.name: description
meta.content: Dalhart Independent School District is located in Dalhart, Texas in the northern Texas panhandle. We are a district of 4 schools, with approximately 1700 students.

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Dalhart, Dalhart ISD, Dalhart Texas, Dalheart, Golden Wolves, Wolves

div.p: Please view this page for information and tip on protecting yourself from the Coronavirus.
Consulte esta página para obtener información y consejos sobre cómo protegerse del Coronavirus.
Dalhart ISD will extend Spring Break until March 27.
Dalhart ISD extenderá las vacaciones de primavera hasta el 27 de marzo.
Free Meals available for pickup behind Dalhart Elementary
Comidas gratis disponibles para recoger detrás de Dalhart Elementary

center.h4: DISD Updated Information Press Release March 26th - English

div.p: All campuses closed for students until April 3rd

center.h4: DISD Updated Information Press Release March 26th - Spanish

div.p: Todos los campus están cerrados para estudiantes hasta el 3 de abril.
All Dalhart ISD campuses will remain closed through May 1, 2020
Todos los campus de Dalhart ISD permanecerán cerrados hasta el 1 de mayo de 2020
More coronavirus tips from the Texas Education Agency
Más consejos sobre coronavirus de la Agencia de Educación de Texas
